name: Play Solana Token
description: Play Solana is a Web3 gaming ecosystem built on the Solana blockchain that connects hardware, software, and cultural IP through a unified network called the PlaySolana SuperHUB. Launched as a community-driven initiative with no external funding, it has grown into a live platform powering a Web3 handheld gaming console, first-party and partner games, DeFi integrations, and on-chain user experiences.
